gold.user: Admin user requesting all workflow schemes to review current configurations.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all workflow schemes available in the Jira instance.

gold.user: Project manager creating a new workflow scheme for a new project.
gold.ideal: Creates a new workflow scheme with the specified details and returns the created scheme.

gold.user: User looking to read multiple workflow schemes based on specific criteria.
gold.ideal: Returns the workflow schemes that match the provided criteria.

gold.user: Admin updating existing workflow schemes to improve project management.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified workflow schemes and returns the updated schemes.

gold.user: User updating mappings for workflow schemes to align with new project requirements.
gold.ideal: Updates the mappings for the specified workflow schemes and returns the updated mappings.

gold.user: Admin deleting an obsolete workflow scheme that is no longer in use.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified workflow scheme and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: User retrieving details of a specific workflow scheme for analysis.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: Project lead updating a workflow scheme to reflect new processes.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified workflow scheme and returns the updated scheme.

gold.user: Admin removing the default workflow from a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Deletes the default workflow from the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: User checking which workflow is set as default for a specific scheme.
gold.ideal: Returns the default workflow associated with the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin updating the default workflow for a workflow scheme to a new process.
gold.ideal: Updates the default workflow for the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin removing an issue type from a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified issue type from the workflow scheme.

gold.user: User retrieving details of a specific issue type within a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Returns details of the specified issue type in the workflow scheme.

gold.user: Project manager assigning a new issue type to a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Sets the specified issue type for the workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin removing a workflow mapping from a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified workflow mapping from the workflow scheme.

gold.user: User checking the workflow associated with a specific workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Returns the workflow associated with the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin updating the workflow mapping for a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Updates the workflow mapping for the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: User analyzing project usages for a specific workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Returns the projects that are using the specified workflow scheme.
